content.rendered:
Home

Careers at Royale Concorde International School

A truly special teacher is very wise, and sees tomorrow in every child’s eyes.

We are always looking for teachers who can not only explain, but inspire the students along with their co-workers. Currently, we have the following openings

Sl No.PostSubject
1PGTAll subjects
2TGTAll subjects
3PRTAll subjects
4Music and Dance teachers–
5Receptionist–
6Admin Assistants–
7Accounts assistants–
8Librarian–
9Transport Incharge–

Facilities

Our school offers a well-designed, aesthetically pleasing campus with well-ventilated classrooms with excellent amenities such as Medicare service, 24-hour security, sports clubs, a library, a play area, and state of art computer laboratories. Highly experienced faculties to deliver to competition. As a result, Royale Concorde International School has earned the reputation of being among the top schools in Bangalore. We’ve also earned a slew of international awards. Students in our school enjoy discovering new interests and making lifelong friends within a kind and caring community. They leave us with a distinctive sense of character, self-confidence, and resourcefulness, with the knowledge and skills necessary to become a leader in the world.

Send in your resume to info@rcis.in
